resources.string: Myfood is a record application for documenting the food you have eaten in one day, this application can calculate the total calories eaten in one day so you can find out whether the calories are insufficient, sufficient or excessive
Monitor whether your calories today are excessive or not, try it at the end of the day!
Calories: %1$s Tinggi badan: %2$s cm Jenis kelamin: %3$s BMI: %4$.2f %5$s
